short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends you a desktop notification when Github status checks pass or fail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of working on something else while waiting for checks to pass, only to forget about them and realize an hour later that some pesky whitespace issue ruined it, use this extension to get a notification as soon as the checks either pass or fail!
